Source.Name: xfce4-notifyd
Source.Description: The Xfce Notify Daemon (xfce4-notifyd for short) is a smallish program that implements the “server-side” portion of the Freedesktop desktop notifications specification.

Source.Name: xfce4-eyes-plugin
Source.Description: A panel plug-in which adds classic eyes to your every step.

Source.Name: xfce4-smartbookmark-plugin
Source.Summary: A plugin allows you to send requests directly to your browser to make search
Source.Description: xfce4-smartbookmark-plugin is a plugin allows you to send requests directly to your browser and perform a custom search.

Source.Name: xfce4-genmon-plugin
Source.Summary: Cyclically spawned executable output on the panel.
Source.Description: Cyclically spawned executable output on the panel.

Source.Name: thunar-vcs-plugin
Source.Summary: An SVN integration and GIT integration to Thunar
Source.Description: The Thunar VCS Plugin adds Subversion and GIT actions to the context menu of thunar. This gives a SVN integration and GIT integration to Thunar.

Source.Name: thunar-archive-plugin
Source.Summary: A plugin allows you to create and extract archive files
Source.Description: The Thunar Archive Plugin allows you to create and extract archive files using the file context menus in the Thunar file manager.

Source.Name: xfce4-alsa-plugin
Source.Summary: Simple ALSA volume control for xfce4-panel
Source.Description: Alsa sound manager panel plugin for xfce for Linux and *BSD.

Source.Name: thunar-media-tags-plugin
Source.Description: The Thunar Media Tags Plugin (thunar-media-tags-plugin) adds special features for media files to the Thunar File Manager.

Source.Name: xfce4-systemload-plugin
Source.Description: Xfce4-systemload-plugin is a plugin which displays the current CPU load, the memory in use, the swap space and the system uptime in the Xfce panel.

Source.Name: xfce4-fsguard-plugin
Source.Summary: File system usage monitor plugin for Xfce4
Source.Description: File system usage monitor plugin for the Xfce4 panel.

Source.Name: xfce4-dict
Source.Summary: A client program to query different dictionaries
Source.Description: xfce4-dict allows you to search different kinds of dictionary services for words or phrases and shows you the result.

Source.Name: xfce4-equake-plugin
Source.Description: Panel plug-in that displays information about earthquakes at regular intervals.

Source.Name: xfce4-volumed-pulse
Source.Summary: A volume keys control daemon for Xfce
Source.Description: Basic daemon enabling the XF86 Volume keys and supporting synchronous volume notifications

Source.Name: xfce4-composite-editor
Source.Summary: simple GUI to control the various Xfce4 WM tweaks that are not available via the "Window Manager Tweaks" control panel.
Source.Description: These settings are available via the xconf settings editor but that is one of the most awkward GUI's I have ever used as you have to select the xfwm4 channel, expand the tree, scroll to the option you want, select it, click edit, change the setting and click save, then the tree gets collapsed and you have to start again! So this nice simple GUI to control the composite manager, the settings are self explanatory.

Source.Name: xfce4-clipman-plugin
Source.Summary: A clipboard plugin for the Xfce4 panel
Source.Description: A clipboard plugin for the Xfce4 panel

Source.Name: xfce4-datetime-plugin
Source.Summary: This plugin shows the date and time in the panel
Source.Description: xfce4-datetime-plugin shows the date and time in the panel, and a calendar appears when you left-click on it.

Source.Name: thunar-shares-plugin
Source.Summary: A plugin which allows you to quickly share a folder using Samba
Source.Description: thunar-shares-plugin allows you to quickly share a folder using Samba from Thunar (the XFCE file manager) without requiring root access.

Source.Name: xfce4-screenshooter
Source.Summary: A plugin allows you to capture the entire screen
Source.Description: This application allows you to capture the entire screen, the active window or a selected region.

Source.Name: xfce4-cpugraph-plugin
Source.Summary: CPU Frequency Graphic plugin for Xfce4
Source.Description: xfce4-cupgraph-plugin shows CPU frequency into a graph in the Xfce Panel.

Source.Name: xfce4-embed-plugin
Source.Summary: Embedding Arbitrary Application plugin for Xfce4
Source.Description: A plug-in for embedding arbitrary application windows into the Xfce panel.

Source.Name: xfce4-sensors-plugin
Source.Description: Reads your hardware sensor values and displays them in your panel

Source.Name: xfce4-xkb-plugin
Source.Summary: A plugin to switch keyboard layouts for the Xfce4 panel
Source.Description: A plugin for the Xfce4 panel displaying keyboard layout. The plugin may be used as an indicator for the current layout and to switch layouts.

Source.Name: xfce4-diskperf-plugin
Source.Summary: A disk usage and performance panel plugin for Xfce
Source.Description: A disk usage and performance panel plugin for Xfce.

Source.Name: xfce4-pulseaudio-plugin
Source.Description: Xfce4-pulseaudio-plugin is a panel plugin for controlling an audio output volume of the PulseAudio mixer

Source.Name: xfce4-time-out-plugin
Source.Summary: A module allows to take periodical breaks from the computer
Source.Description: This plugin makes it possible to take periodical breaks from the computer every X minutes. During breaks it locks your screen. It optionally allows you to postpone breaks for a certain time.

Source.Name: xfce4-quicklauncher-plugin
Source.Description: xfce4-quicklauncher-plugin is a plugin which allow you to start apps quickly.

Source.Name: xfce4-notes-plugin
Source.Summary: Notes plugin provides you a quick way you had do with Post-It's
Source.Description: The notes plugin provides you a quick way to paste text, to write down a list of things, to leave a note to your friend, or whatever you had do with Post-It's.

Source.Name: xfce4-battery-plugin
Source.Summary: Battery monitor panel plugin for Xfce4
Source.Description: A battery monitor panel plugin for Xfce4, compatible with APM and ACPI, for Linux and *BSD.

Source.Name: xfce4-mount-plugin
Source.Description: xfce4-mount-plugin is a mount/umount utility for the panel.

Source.Name: xfce4-timer-plugin
Source.Description: With this plugin you can add timers (alarm or countdown) to your Xfce panel. You can display a warning window and/or run a custom command when alarm rings, repeat alarms etc.

Source.Name: xfce4-mailwatch-plugin
Source.Description: A mailbox watch/check plugin for the Xfce4 panel

Source.Name: xfce4-wavelan-plugin
Source.Summary: This plugin is used to display stats from a wireless lan interface
Source.Description: xfce4-wavelan-plugin shows signal quality as percentage.This plugin is quite easy to use.

Source.Name: xfce4-cpufreq-plugin
Source.Description: xfce4-cpufreq-plugin shows CPU frequency in the Xfce Panel.

Source.Name: xfce4-dev-tools
Source.Description: Xfce4-dev-tools contains common tools required by Xfce developers and people that want to build Xfce from SVN. In addition, this package contains the Xfce developer's handbook.

Source.Name: gtk-style-xfce
Source.Description: Gtk2-engines-xfce is a GTK+ engine for Xfce desktop environment.

Source.Name: xfwm4-themes
Source.Description: Xfce4-themes is a set of additional themes for the Xfwm window manager.

Source.Name: icon-theme-xfce4
Source.Description: Icon theme Rodent for the Xfce Desktop Environment.

Source.Name: Thunar
Source.Description: Thunar has been designed from the ground up to be fast and easy-to-use. Its user interface is clean and intuitive, and does not include any confusing or useless options. Thunar is fast and responsive with a good start up time and directory load time. Thunar is accessible using Assistive Technologies and is fully standarts compliant.

Source.Name: xfconf
Source.Description: Xfconf is a hirerchical (tree-like) configuration system for the Xfce graphical desktop environment.

Source.Name: xfce4-dev-tools
Source.Description: Xfce4-dev-tools contains common tools required by Xfce developers and people that want to build Xfce from SVN. In addition, this package contains the Xfce developer's handbook.

Source.Name: libxfce4util
Source.Description: Libxfce4util is a basic utility non-GUI functions for Xfce desktop environment.

Source.Name: exo
Source.Description: exo is an extension library to Xfce, developed by os-cillation. While Xfce comes with quite a few libraries that are targeted at desktop development, exo is targeted at application development.

Source.Name: xfdesktop
Source.Description: The desktop manager sets the background image, provides a right-click menu to launch applications and can optionally show files (including application launchers) or iconified windows. It includes gradient support for background color, saturation support for background image, real multiscreen and xinerama support, and it provides a desktop menu editor.

Source.Name: Terminal
Source.Description: Terminal is a modern, lightweight, and low memory cost terminal emulator with tabs and multiple windows for the Xfce desktop environment. It offers full-customization for the key bindings, the aspect, the colors, and more.

Source.Name: xfce4-panel
Source.Description: The Xfce4 panel supports multiple panels, with many options for their position, appearance, transparency and behavior. There are many items available by default to full fit a panel, like application launchers with detachable menus, a graphical pager, a tasklist, a clock, a system tray, a show / hide desktop switcher, and even more. It offers an easy way to add items using a dialog, and to move items accross different panels.

Source.Name: garcon
Source.Description: garcon is an implementation of the freedesktop.org menu specification replacing the former Xfce menu library libxfce4menu. It is based on GLib/GIO only and aims at covering the entire specification except for legacy menus.

Source.Name: xfce4-power-manager
Source.Summary: A power manager for the Xfce desktop
Source.Description: This software is a power manager for the Xfce desktop, Xfce power manager manages the power sources on the computer and the devices that can be controlled to reduce their power consumption. (such as LCD brightness level, monitor sleep, CPU frequency scaling). In addition, xfce4-power-manager provides a set of freedesktop-compliant DBus interfaces to inform other applications about current power level so that they can adjust their power consumption.

Source.Name: xfce4-appfinder
Source.Description: Xfce4-appfinder is a useful software that permits you to find every application in the system supporting desktop entry format.

Source.Name: xfwm4
Source.Description: The Xfce4 window manager manages the placement of application windows on the screen, provides beautiful window decorations, manages workspaces or virtual desktops, and natively supports multiscreen mode.

Source.Name: xfce4-settings
Source.Description: Xfce4-settings is a configuration manager for Xfce desktop environment.

Source.Name: xfce4-taskmanager
Source.Description: Xfce-taskmanager is a small taskmanager based on the Xfce libraries.

Source.Name: thunar-volman
Source.Summary: A extension for the Xfce Thunar File Manager
Source.Description: thunar-volman is an extension for the Thunar File Manager, which enables automatic management of removable drives and media. For example, if thunar-volman is installed and configured properly, and you plug in your digical camera, it will automatically spawn your preferred photo application and import the new pictures from your camera.

Source.Name: xfce4-session
Source.Description: The session manager allows the user to save sessions and restore them after login. It is capable of saving several different sessions. It comes with three splash screen engines. And at last it helps you to log out, reboot, and shutdown the system.

Source.Name: tumbler
Source.Description: Tumbler is a thumbnail service for the filemanager of Xfce desktop environment.

Source.Name: libxfcegui4
Source.Description: Libxfcegui4 is a various GTK+ widgets for Xfce desktop environment.

Source.Name: libxfce4ui
Source.Description: libxfce4ui is a various GTK+ widgets for Xfce desktop environment.

Source.Name: eatmonkey
Source.Description: Eatmonkey is a download manager that works exclusively with aria2, the ultra fast download utility.

Source.Name: gigolo
Source.Summary: A frontend to easily manage connections to remote filesystems using GIO/GVfs
Source.Description: Gigolo allows you to quickly connect/mount local and remote filesystems and manage bookmarks of such.

Source.Name: orage
Source.Description: Orage is a time-managing application for the Xfce desktop environment.

Source.Name: parole
Source.Description: Parole is a modern simple media player based on the GStreamer framework and written to fit well in the Xfce desktop. Parole is designed with simplicity, speed and resource usage in mind.

Source.Name: mousepad
Source.Description: Mousepad is a text editor for Xfce.

Component.Name: desktop
Component.Summary: Component that includes desktop software and desktop environments
Masaüstü yazılımları ve masaüstü ortamlarını içeren bileşen
Bu masa üstü kompüter üçün proqramlar olan komponentdir.
Компонент, который включает в себя программное обеспечение рабочего стола и среды рабочего стола
Komponente, die desktop-software und desktop-Umgebungen
Composante qui comprend les logiciels et les environnements de bureau
Component.Description: Desktop component includes basic desktop and gui toolkits (GimpToolKit, QT) and desktop environments and applications built with these tool kits. In that component, all desktop environments, especially KDE gnome Xfce LXDE and lxqt are available.

Masaüstü bileşeni temel masaüstü ve guı araç kitleri (Gımptoolkit, QT) ve masaüstü ortamları ve bu araç kitleri ile inşa uygulamaları içerir. Bu bileşende, tüm masaüstü ortamları, özellikle KDE gnome XFCE LXDE ve lxqt mevcuttur.

Komponent Desktop daxildir əsas dəstləri və alətləri üçün masa üstü kompüter və qrafik istifadəçi interfeysi (GimpToolKit, QT) və ətraf mühitin masa üstü və proqramlar vasitəsilə yaradılmış bu alətlər dəsti. Bu komponent bütün masa üstü mühitləri, xüsusilə gnome Xfce LXDE və lxqt KDE mövcuddur.

Компонент Desktop включает в себя основные наборы инструментов для настольных компьютеров и графического интерфейса пользователя (GimpToolKit, QT) и среды рабочего стола и приложения, созданные с помощью этих наборов инструментов. В этом компоненте доступны все среды рабочего стола, особенно KDE gnome Xfce LXDE и lxqt.

Die Desktop-Komponente umfasst die grundlegende desktop - und grafische Benutzeroberfläche (GimpToolKit, QT) sowie die mit diesen toolkits erstellten desktop-Umgebungen und-Anwendungen. Alle desktop-Umgebungen sind in dieser Komponente verfügbar, insbesondere KDE gnome Xfce LXDE und lxqt.

La composante de bureau comprend le bureau de base et l'interface graphique utilisateur (GimpToolKit, QT) toolkits et les environnements de bureau et les applications créées avec ces toolkits. Tous les environnements de bureau sont disponibles dans cette composante, en particulier KDE gnome Xfce LXDE et lxqt.

Component.Name: desktop.xfce
Component.Summary: This is the root component that contains the xfce4 desktop environment.
xfce masaüstü ortamını içeren kök bileşendir.
xfce masa üstü mühitini ehtiva edən bir kök komponentdir
xfce-это корневой компонент, содержащий среду рабочего стола
desktop.xfce ist die root-Komponente, die xfce4 desktop-Umgebung enthält
desktop.xfce est le composant racine qui contient l'environnement de xfce4 bureau
Component.Description: As offical description that Xfce is a lightweight desktop environment for UNIX-like operating systems. It aims to be fast and low on system resources, while still being visually appealing and user friendly. In that component xfce, addons, panel extensions and its related programs like gigolo mousepad and other programs comes with.

Xfce'nin UNİX benzeri işletim sistemleri için hafif bir masaüstü ortamı olduğu resmi açıklama olarak. Hala görsel olarak çekici ve kullanıcı dostu olurken, sistem kaynakları üzerinde hızlı ve düşük olmayı hedeflemektedir. Bu bileşen xfce, eklentiler, panel uzantıları ve gigolo mousepad ve diğer programlar gibi ilgili programları ile birlikte gelir

Xfce-nin UNIX kimi əməliyyat sistemləri üçün yüngül bir masa üstü mühiti olduğunu rəsmi olaraq təsvir edir. Bu, eyni zamanda vizual müraciət və istifadəçi dostu, sistem resursları sürətli və aşağı olmaq məqsədi daşıyır. Bu komponentdə, Xfce, addons, panel uzantıları və gigolo mousepad və digər proqramlar kimi əlaqəli proqramlar içerir.

Как официальное описание, что Xfce-это легкая настольная среда для UNIX-подобных операционных систем. Он стремится быть быстрым и низким на системных ресурсах, в то же время визуально привлекательным и удобным для пользователя. В этом компоненте xfce, аддоны, расширения панелей и связанные с ними программы, такие как gigolo mousepad и другие программы.

Als offizielle Beschreibung, dass Xfce eine leichte desktop-Umgebung für UNIX-ähnliche Betriebssysteme ist. Es zielt darauf ab, schnell und niedrig auf Systemressourcen zu sein, während immer noch optisch Ansprechend und benutzerfreundlich. In dieser Komponente kommt xfce, addons, panel extensions und zugehörige Programme wie gigolo mousepad und andere Programme mit.

Comme description officielle que Xfce est un environnement de bureau léger pour les systèmes D'exploitation de type UNIX. Il vise à être rapide et à faible sur les ressources système, tout en étant visuellement attrayant et convivial. Dans ce component xfce, addons, panel extensions et ses programmes associés comme gigolo mousepad et d'autres programmes vient avec.

Component.Name: desktop.xfce.addon
Component.Summary: Component that includes extra programs (addons) desktop software and desktop environments
xfce ek paketler içeren bileşendir
Bu xfce üçün ek paketler olan komponentdir.
компонент, содержащий Плагины xfce.
Komponente, die Xfce-addons enthält.
composant contenant Xfce addons.
Component.Description: That is the component that contains plug-in packages for the xfce panel and some other xfce applications.
xfce panel ve diğer bazı uygulamalar için eklenti paketlerini içeren bileşendir.
Xfce panel üçün və bəzi digər tətbiqlər üçün plugin paketlərini ehtiva edən bir komponentdir.
Это компонент, который содержит пакеты плагинов для панели xfce и некоторых других приложений xfce.
Das ist die Komponente, die plug-in-Pakete für das Xfce-panel und einige andere xfce-Anwendungen enthält.
C'est le composant qui contient les paquets plug-in pour le panneau xfce et d'autres applications xfce.

Component.Name: desktop.xfce.plugin
Component.Summary: Component that includes desktop software and desktop environments
xfce eklentilerini içeren bileşendir
Bu xfce üçün eklentiler olan komponentdir.
компонент, содержащий Плагины xfce.
Komponente, die Xfce-plugins enthält.
composant contenant Xfce plugins.
Component.Description: Component that includes desktop software and desktop environments
xfce eklentilerini içeren bileşendir
Bu xfce üçün eklentiler olan komponentdir.
компонент, содержащий Плагины xfce.
Komponente, die Xfce-plugins enthält.
composant contenant Xfce plugins.

Component.Name: desktop.xfce.base
Component.Summary: Component that includes base packages of xfce desktop environment.
Xfce masaüstü ortamının temel paketlerini içeren bileşen.
Xfce masa üstü mühitinin əsas paketlərini əhatə edən komponent.
Компонент, который включает в себя основные пакеты среды рабочего стола xfce.
Komponente, die Basispakete der Xfce-desktop-Umgebung enthält.
Composant qui inclut les paquets de base de l'environnement de bureau xfce.
Component.Description: Xfce-includes all the packages that will be sufficient to run the Xfce desktop in its simplest and simplest form, such as the panel.
xfce-panel gibi xfce masaüstünü en sade ve basit haliyle çalştırmak için yeterli olacak tüm paketleri içerir.
Xfce masa üstü üçün ən asan və ən sadə şəkildə işləmək üçün kifayət edəcək xfce-panel kimi bütün paketləri əhatə edir.
он включает в себя все пакеты, такие как xfce-panel, которые будут достаточными для того, чтобы рабочий стол xfce работал в самой простой и простой форме.
Xfce-enthält alle Pakete, die ausreichen, um den Xfce desktop in seiner einfachsten und einfachsten form auszuführen, wie das panel.
Xfce-inclut tous les paquets qui seront suffisants pour exécuter le bureau Xfce dans sa forme la plus simple et la plus simple, comme le panneau.

Component.Name: desktop.xfce.admin
Component.Summary: That component includes xfce administration tools.
xfce yönetici araçlarını içeren paket bileşeni.
Bu masa üstü kompüter üçün proqram olan komponentdir.
этот компонент включает в себя средства администрирования xfce.
Komponente, enthält Xfce-Verwaltungstools.
cette composante comprend des outils d'administration xfce.
Component.Description: That component includes xfce administration tools.
xfce yönetici araçlarını içeren paket bileşeni.
Bu masa üstü kompüter üçün proqram olan komponentdir.
этот компонент включает в себя средства администрирования xfce.
Komponente, enthält Xfce-Verwaltungstools.
cette composante comprend des outils d'administration xfce.

Component.Name: desktop.xfce.lookandfeel
Component.Summary: Includes appearance and palettes for xfce
Xfce için görünüm ve paletleri içerir
Xfce üçün görünüşünü və paletleri ehtiva edir.
Включает в себя внешний вид и палитры для Xfce
Inklusive Aussehen und Paletten für Xfce
Comprend l'apparence et les palettes pour Xfce
Component.Description: The default recommended views for Xfce include themes and packages of the icon set.
Xfce için öntanımlı olarak tavsiye edilen görünümleri temaları ve simge setinin paketlerini içerir.
Default Xfce üçün tövsiyə təqdim mövzular və icon set paketləri ehtiva edir.
По умолчанию рекомендуемые представления для Xfce включают темы и пакеты набора значков.
Die empfohlenen Standardbilder für Xfce enthalten Themen und icon-Set-Pakete.
Les images recommandées par défaut pour Xfce incluent les thèmes et les paquets de jeu d'icônes.
